Package org.qscript.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EvaluationErrorEvent
    Event fired when we get an evaluation (runtime) error
    HaltExecutionEvent
    Event fired when the script evaluation is halted by the user or it has exceeded its alloted time..
    OutputEvent
    Event is fired when an output event is fired.
    ResumeEvent
    Event is fired if when the script resumes whne the script detects that it has been restarted after waiting for a predetermined time.
    ScriptEvent
    Base class for all scripting events
    ScriptFinishedEvent
    Event fired if the script stops normally i.e.
    StoreUpdateEvent
    Event fired when a variable has been updated and stored.
    SyntaxErrorEvent
    Event is fired if the parser detects a syntax error on initialising the script.
    TraceEvent
    This event is fired after evaluating a token at runtime.
    WaitEvent
    This event if fired when the WAIT(timeout) operator has been executed, if timeout != 0 then a resume event will be fired when the script is restarted.
